requirements.summary: Keep the proposal layout/behaviors intact while updating the grid under /saesha.jpg to a static 2x3 set of the 6 new images.
acceptanceCriteria: The main /saesha.jpg image remains at the top of the card spanning both columns.
Exactly 6 smaller photo tiles render under the main image in a 2-column grid (3 rows), using the 6 new uploaded static assets.
YES/NO buttons behavior and the YES success screen remain unchanged.

file_operations.description: Replace the current mixed static+upload-preview tile area with a fully static 2-column grid of 6 small tiles (3 rows) under the existing /saesha.jpg main image, referencing: /assets/IMG-20260208-WA0008-1.jpg, /assets/IMG-20260208-WA0010-1.jpg, /assets/IMG-20260208-WA0005-5.jpg, /assets/IMG-20260208-WA0008-2.jpg, /assets/IMG-20260208-WA0010-2.jpg, /assets/IMG-20260208-WA0005-6.jpg; ensure YES/NO logic and success screen remain unchanged.

Create a small reusable tile component that renders a static image with consistent sizing/rounded corners and can switch to a pink-themed placeholder when the image fails to load; used by App.tsx for the 6 small tiles.

requirements.summary: Remove in-page local photo upload UI/state and clean up any unused code tied to local uploads.
acceptanceCriteria: No upload/replace/clear photo controls are visible in the UI.
frontend/src/App.tsx no longer imports or uses useLocalPhotoTilePreviews, useRef for file input, lucide-react Upload/X icons, or any handlers solely for local photo uploads.
The app compiles with no unused imports/variables related to local photo upload.

file_operations.description: Remove the hidden file input, Add/Replace photos button, Clear button, related handlers, and associated local preview state; remove imports for useLocalPhotoTilePreviews, useRef, and lucide-react Upload/X icons if they become unused.
Delete the local photo preview hook if it is no longer referenced anywhere after removing upload functionality, ensuring there are no remaining imports/usages.

requirements.summary: Preserve graceful fallback placeholders for missing images without breaking the grid layout.
acceptanceCriteria: If a small-tile image fails to load, that tile shows a placeholder with the same sizing/rounded corners as an image tile.
If /saesha.jpg fails to load, the existing main-image placeholder behavior remains in place.
No broken layout or console errors caused by image load failures (beyond standard 404s when simulating missing assets).

file_operations.description: Implement tile-level image error handling (e.g., via onError-driven state) to render a visually consistent pink-themed placeholder while keeping the exact tile dimensions and rounded corners so the 2x3 grid remains intact.
Wire small-tile rendering through StaticPhotoTile so each of the 6 static assets gracefully falls back to a placeholder on load failure; keep the existing /saesha.jpg main-image fallback unchanged.
